## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4d551b7911958e1076f15bbee358feaed7da5b9aea78210268e6e68261822c7a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@pwa-ib/eslint-plugin-compat' @ 1.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
